# WPS WebOffice SDK API Reference

这是 WPS WebOffice SDK 的 API 参考文档，用于在 Cursor 中提供智能提示和自动补全功能。

## Word API

Word API 提供了对 Word 文档的操作能力，包括文档、段落、表格等操作。

- [活动文档(ActiveDocument)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Document.html)
  ActiveDocument 对象代表当前打开的文档，提供了对文档内容和属性的访问能力。

- [活动窗口(ActiveWindow)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Window.html)
  ActiveWindow 对象代表当前活动的文档窗口，可以控制窗口的显示和视图。

- [活动任务窗格(ActivePane)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Pane.html)
- [页面(Pages)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Pages.html)
- [视图(View)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/View.html)
- [选区(Selection)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Selection.html)
- [区域(Range)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Range.html)
- [节(Sections)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Sections.html)
- [查找(Find)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Find.html)
- [字体(Font)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Font.html)
- [表格(Tables)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Tables.html)
- [表格行(Rows)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Rows.html)
- [表格列(Columns)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Columns.html)
- [单元格(Cells)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Cells.html)
- [形状(Shapes)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Shapes.html)
- [嵌入式图形(InlineShapes)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/InlineShapes.html)
- [OLE 特性(OLEFormat)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/OLEFormat.html)
- [书签(Bookmarks)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Bookmarks.html)
- [公文域(DocumentFields)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/DocumentFields.html)
- [域(Fields)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Fields.html)
- [内容控件(ContentControls)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/ContentControls.html)
- [超链接(Hyperlinks)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Hyperlinks.html)
- [评论(Comments)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Comments.html)
- [审阅者(Reviewers)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Reviewers.html)
- [修订(Revisions)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Revisions.html)
- [文档属性(DocumentProperties)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/DocumentProperties.html)
- [页面属性(PageSetup)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/PageSetup.html)
- [段落(Paragraphs)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Paragraphs.html)
- [段落格式(ParagraphFormat)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/ParagraphFormat.html)
- [页眉/页脚(HeadersFooters)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/HeadersFooters.html)
- [缩放(Zoom)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/Zoom.html)
- [水印(WaterMarks)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Word/WaterMarks.html)

### Excel API

Excel API 提供了对 Excel 工作簿和工作表的操作能力。

- [工作簿(Workbook)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Excel/Workbook.html)
  Workbook 对象代表一个 Excel 工作簿，提供了对工作簿属性和内容的访问能力。

- [工作表(Sheet)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Excel/Sheet.html)
- [区域(Range)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Excel/Range.html)
- [选区(Selection)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Excel/Selection.html)
- [图表(Chart)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Excel/Chart.html)
- [边框(Borders)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Excel/Borders.html)
- [字体(Font)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/Excel/Font.html)

### PowerPoint API

PowerPoint API 提供了对演示文稿的操作能力。

- [演示文稿(ActivePresentation)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/PPT/Presentation.html)
  ActivePresentation 对象代表当前打开的演示文稿，提供了对演示文稿内容和属性的访问能力。

- [幻灯片(Slide)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/PPT/Slide.html)
- [形状(Shapes)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/PPT/Shapes.html)
- [放映窗口(SlideShowWindow)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/PPT/SlideShowWindow.html)
- [视图(View)](https://solution.wps.cn/docs/client/api/PPT/View.html)
